page.title: 08Local News In Ogmore Vale.
page.content: { SURGERY PLANS A two doctor surgery is to be built in Ogmore Vale at the junction of Commercial Street and the Aber Road and will serve the Ogmore Valley. Before it can be built a sewer crossing the site will have to be diverted. {SWIMMING POOL REPAIRS Ogmore Vale swimming pool is to be closed for four weeks for repairs. The main steel framework was found to be carroded. { CYCLE RACE A cycle race around the valley was recently held and organised by the Ogmore Valley Wheelers. {SHOP BREAK IN Thieves broke in to the CO-OP butchers shop in Ogmore Vale and stole meat and tinned food.
